issue.title: [C++] README missing instructions for libboost-regex-dev
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2291](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2291). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After following the instructions in the README, I could not generate a makefile using CMake because of a missing dependency.

The README needs to be updated to include installing libboost-regex-dev.
